description: React component for a versatile video player supporting MP4, YouTube, and Vimeo sources with features like Picture-in-Picture, autoplay, and intersection-based UI adjustments.

methods.name: tryEnterPipForIframe
methods.description: Checks if Picture-in-Picture is supported for embedded iframe videos and updates status accordingly.

methods.name: handlePip
methods.description: Handles Picture-in-Picture toggling for either MP4 videos or embedded iframes.

methods.name: onMp4Ended
methods.description: Handles logic when MP4 video playback ends, triggering autoplay countdown if enabled.

methods.name: cancelAutoplay
methods.description: Cancels the autoplay countdown and resets relevant state.

methods.name: playNow
methods.description: Immediately triggers playing of the next video during autoplay countdown.

methods.name: handleUserPlayGesture
methods.description: Handles user interaction to bypass browser autoplay restrictions, allowing manual start.

methods.name: VideoPlayer({ video, onEnded, onIntersectChange, nextVideo, shouldAutoplay = false })

ctags.name: VideoPlayer
ctags.pattern: /^export default function VideoPlayer({ video, onEnded, onIntersectChange, nextVideo, shouldAutopl/
ctags.signature: ({ video, onEnded, onIntersectChange, nextVideo, shouldAutoplay = false })
